metadata.title: CVE-2021-46348 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'ECMA_STRING_IS_REF_EQUALS_TO_ONE (string_p)' failedat /jerry-core/ecma/base/ecma-literal-storage.c in JerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
